short_description:
Got a lot of photos and don't know which ones to print? Working on a web project and wanting to know which stock image will fit the most?
Simply load the folder containing the images into Favorite Pictures Picker! Then the soft will randomly confront the pictures, letting you pick the one you find 
the best, two pictures at a time. Only the first 9 pictures you picked the most will remain! Then you will have two choices, mark them using the 5 stars rating metadata, or mark them 
and move them to a new "Favorites" folder for better retrieval. Handy!
summary: Let you guess which picture you prefer
